name: cross_correlation
label: Cross Correlation
description: A cross correlation between two stations A and B. Station metadata is not recorded here as it is part of either SEED or StationXML files. Any previously applied processing is also not part of the entity but rather of the entity used by the activity generating this one.

attributes.name: correlation_type
attributes.description: The type of performed cross correlation as a string.

attributes.name: max_lag_time_in_sec
attributes.description: The maximum lag time used during the calculation in seconds.

attributes.name: station_id_a
attributes.description: The SEED identifier of station A.

attributes.name: station_id_b
attributes.description: The SEED identifier of station B.
